archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1396
archimate:Requirement.documentation:
Related to: - Feature_20: Mobile Addon - Feature_24: Mobile - Add-on - Extra Data - minutes - MVNO - Feature_27: Mobile - Carry-over Data
As a customer I want to add "Extra Data" and/or "Extra Minutes" to a new or existing subscription; where I can specify to apply the add-on as one-off or recurring. Any unused data can be carried over/added to the newly added add-on

properties.value: Extra add on can be defined as additional bucket of data or minutes.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
